channel.title: Mcafee on sale!
channel.description:
Personally, I am not a fan of Mcafee but this is a pretty darn good price for Mcafee. Wanted to share this with all of you
http://www.bestbuy.com/site/McAfee+-+AntiVirus+2013+Plus+-+3+PC/1304939294.p?id=mp1304939294&skuId=1304939294
I even got express shipping for free.
*Make sure to purchase it today though cause Best Buy has a bad thing about changing prices at random times!

item.title: Mcafee on sale!
item.dc:creator: @IOWNzEZIMADUH IOWNzEZIMADUH
item.description:
@IOWNzEZIMADUH wrote:

By posting this you’re supporting a shitty company. Seriously guys, if you want mcafee so bad, torrent it for free. But even then just get something like malwarebytes.

I don’t really understand why people today still need an antivirus, though.

Read full topic

item.title: Mcafee on sale!
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

i have malware byte, comodo, and spybot all installed. but havent ran them in years. i always have my firewall turned off, and all ‘security’ shit disabled.

i use my laptops for runescape/rsps/banking/paypal/and more, and never had any problems

Read full topic

item.title: Mcafee on sale!
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:3, topic:530924”]am i the only person here who doesnt actually use antivirus software?[/quote]I don’t either for the most part. I only use malwarebytes and spybot search and destroy if I actually need to remove something from mine or somebody else’s computer.

Read full topic
